text:
Alright mate, I've got my professional practice assignment brief now, and basically it says that I can write myself a brief, as long as I get it okayed by someone in the industry.. so was just wondering if you could be that someone in the industry? :innocent: 
All you'd need to do is just quickly go over it (I'll make sure the brief is brief.. pun intended) offer any suggestions, in ways I could do something a little different or just simply say that's a crap idea :joy:

Hey dude, ahh sounds good! 

Yeah sure thing I would be fine with that! I can give you some pointers into shots that I think might look good on a showreel too if needs be!

Cheers bud :+1::skin-tone-3:
I'll send you a screenshot tomorrow of the extremely short descriptions of the 2 ideas I have so far.

Yeah if you could that would be awesome :+1:

I do want everything I'm doing this year to end up in my showreel really anyway so that would be very helpful thank you.
